title: Group Therapy: The Fence is an Inch on Their Property
description: A listener calls in with a problem she's dealing with that caused a screaming fight with her neighbor.  Her and her husband just put in a 60 foot privacy fence and the neighbors pointed out that it goes onto their property.  Now they want her to move the fence or sign an affidavit in case they ever sell the house.  She needs to know what they should do!
